/** * Thrown when there is a failure condition during the encoding process. This exception is thrown when an * {@link Encoder} encounters a encoding specific exception such as invalid data, inability to calculate a checksum, * characters outside of the expected range. * * @version $Id: EncoderException.java 1429871 2013-01-07 16:12:16Z ggregory $ */
